sqlquery.name: SheetTree.Sheetquery.tree
sqlquery.select: SELECT 'tree.nodes["'||BASECATEGORYCLASSCODE||','||BASECATEGORYCODE||'"] = "text:' ||BASECATEGORYNAME||URL as COL FROM ( SELECT #xx#||C650000002 AS BASECATEGORYCODE, C650000001 AS BASECATEGORYNAME, #xx# AS BASECATEGORYCLASSCODE, to_char(C650000002) AS BASECATEGORYSCHAMA, ';#data_class#";' as URL, 0 AS NUM FROM {WF:Config_BaseCategoryClass} UNION ALL SELECT #xx#||TO_NUMBER(C650000003) AS BASECATEGORYCODE, C650000001 AS BASECATEGORYNAME, #xx#||to_char(C650000010) AS BASECATEGORYCLASSCODE, C650000002 AS BASECATEGORYSCHAMA, ';#data#";'as URL, 1 AS NUM FROM {WF:Config_BaseCategory} ORDER BY BASECATEGORYCLASSCODE, NUM, BASECATEGORYCODE ) ORDER BY NUM,COL
